title: npccoin
author: npccoin
content: NPC Coin is taking the internet by storm...NPC Coin’s mission is to utilize a marketing strategy never seen before in the web3 space to ultimately attract a community of like-minded individuals who want to break free from the traditional paradigm of becoming an NPC in the modern day system.- Utilizing the culturally-relevant term “NPC” discussed by the likes of Elon Musk and many others to market our project and its purpose.- Empowering the community to spread awareness of NPC Coin’s mission through additional $NPC rewards via our “Shill-To-Earn” platform.- Partnering with influencers who align with our mission to bring awareness of NPC Coin’s purpose to new potential community members.- Creating a flourishing ecosystem built on the community behind $NPC including the launch of merchandise, NFTs, DApps, real-world products, meetups, and so much more…Check it out here:https://npccoin.io/Telegram:https://t.me/npccoinverify
